sen.e: It is a mandatory removal of a criminal sentenced to death for murder to another province to build a house in order to get of trouble if this criminal at risk of being revenged by parents, a brother, a sister etc. of the person who has been murdered.

sen.j: 「法曹至要抄」によれば、もし群盗共殺の時は、下手人および頭首人を移す。
sen.e: According to the Hossoshiyosho, if a gang of robbers committed a murder, the murderer and its boss shall be removed to a province. If the person who been murdered do not have no relation and therefore is not at any risk of being revenged, the criminal shall be affected to a group of technicians, Ryoko, Kanko, Kenin or Nuhi. However, if the criminal is a woman or if a Kenin or Nuhi of a another house is murdered, the criminal shall not be removed to another province.
